entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor EventCallback not being considered immutable thus making child components to be rendered again #49476
  • Perf regression: mvc #49473
  • Move aspnetcore to leverage JsonWebToken and JsonWebTokenHandler #49469
  • [Blazor] Configure detailed errors for Razor component endpoints #49468
    8.0-rc1
  • RequestSizeLimit throws an error #49461
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49459
  • Allow overriding SignalR's Redis backplane channel's prefix instead of relying on hub class' name #49457
  • HttpNavigationManager already initialized on Blazor SSR. #49456
    8.0-rc1
  • IDX10720: Unable to create KeyedHashAlgorithm for algorithm 'HS512', the key size must be greater than: '512' bits, key has '256' bits. Arg_ParamName_Name #49455
  • Updating HttpContext.Request.Path inside middleware has no effect in selecting the endpoint for the request #49454
  • SignalR working even with API down WFT????? #49453

Closed

  • [Blazor] Form events follow ups #47804
    8.0-preview7
  • CascadingModelBinder: remove the IsFixed parameter #47902
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor SSR traditional form post handling #48760
    8.0-preview7
  • "There is no event handler associated with this event" error when submitting a Blazor form #49145
    8.0-preview7
  • NavigationException when attempting to navigate after submitting a form #49143
    8.0-preview7
  • RDG does not support private parameter and return types #47339
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS0246 error for endpoint with generic type parameter #49384
  • [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2112, condition `<disabled>' not met #49302
  • Blazor SSR form post handling: integrate errors with ErrorBoundary #47903
    8.0-preview7
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49444
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #49458
  • When form is submitted with no handler, or the handler can't be found, change status to 400/404 #49359
    8.0-rc2
  • Don't reject ambiguous forms until we try to dispatch the submit event #49362
    8.0-preview7
  • Design proposal for a new QuickGridC component #49426
  • Blazor Web App dotnet 8 preview 6 request hangs on large page #49466
  • Detect invalid route such as `@page "/fhir{system}" in Blazor component #49445
  • Can built-in Ratelimit middleware work in Blazor Server App #49460
  • Blazor 8: Blazor Web App router does not seem to see pages in an RCL #49432
  • run programs #49462
  • Post docker compose and starting the microservice , service url comes back ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE #49182
  • Json Converter option ignored while binding enum from query #49398
  • Perf regression: json #49451

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix branch Wilson7 tests #49474
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Web to latest 2.13 which has defense in dep… #49467
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Emit diagnostics for unsupported RDG scenarios #49417
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview7
  • Forms PRG and error handling fixes #49472
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Forms behavior clarifications #49340
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `be03d00` to `cc36671` #49408
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • update version of identity model libraries #49349
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    Perf, area-networking, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • API template updates #49394
    area-mvc
  • Add support for explicit IParsable<T>.TryParse in RDF. #49317
    area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9a77922` to `b644ea1` #49407
    area-infrastructure
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime
